items.title: Live: Will Nifty mount to 25,000 amid higher volatility? | RBI policy outcome in focus |Opening Bell
items.description: Indian benchmark indices Sensex and Nifty extended their bull run to fifth straight day supported by gains in financial and technology stocks. Both the benchmarks gained 1 percent each in a highly volatile session, with Nifty ending above 24,700 on its weekly expiry day. Experts now eye Nifty to mount above 25,000 mark, with support placed around 24,350. The Reserve Bank of India (RBI) will deliver its policy outcome, with Street expecting no change in repo rates but some liquidity measures could be on the anvil to support growth. This morning, global cues were mixed. US markets retreated from their record highs, while Asia-Pacific markets were mixed. Among stocks in focus, watch out for Rate sensitive stocks, Dr Reddy's, and Garden Reach. Catch Lovisha Darad in conversation with Raja Venkatraman, Co-Founder, NeoTrader & Trading Influencer.

items.title: Mobikwik sets price band of Rs 265-279 a share; cuts down IPO size for third time
items.description: Anchor bidding will begin on December 10, and the issue will close on December 13. The basis of allotment is scheduled for December 16, followed by the initiation of refunds and equity credit on December 17

items.title: What next for MapmyIndia after consumer business fiasco?
items.description: Transfer of B2C business for a minority stake has upset investors.

items.title: Vishal Mega Mart IPO price band set at Rs 74-78 per share; check listing timeline
items.description: Vishal Mega Mart IPO anchor bidding will be on December 10, with the public issue open during December 11-13. The basis of share allotment is scheduled for December 16.

items.title: Near-term risks to investing in Indian equities remain
items.description: Any market that assumes that the liquidity will take care of investment mistakes, valuation errors and capital allocation risks will always learn old lessons in new ways.

items.title: Indus Towers promoters sells Rs 2800 crore worth shares in a block deal
items.description: As of September 30, Usha Martin Telematics Limited had a 0.74 percent stake and  Omega Telecom Holdings Private Limited had a 2.26 percent stake in Indus Towers.

items.title: Nifty, Sensex open flat ahead of RBI MPC meet outcome; FMCG, auto stocks gain
items.description: The mid and small-cap indices jumped 0.1 and 0.4 percent, marking an impressive 10-day streak of outperformance.

items.title: Agri Picks Report December 06, 2024: Geojit Financial Services
items.description: According to Geojit Financial Services, Farmers in Gujarat have sown rabi crops over 2.1 million hectares as of Monday, down 28.4% on year from nearly 3 million hectares sown in the same period last year, according to a release by the state agriculture department.

items.title: Angel One shares drop 5% after client acquisition falls for second straight month
items.description: November had lesser trading days in 2024 as compared to October as well as the same month last year, which could've also adversely impacted Angel One's performance during the month.

items.title: RITES shares jump nearly 5% on securing Rs 148.25 crore order from IIM Raipur
items.description: The scope of the project includes execution, supervision, monitoring, and development, to be completed on a cost-plus basis within a timeline of 23 months.

items.title: Newgen Software stock rises 3.5% after Jefferies rolls out positive outlook, sees 15% upside
items.description: Newgen Software secured an order from the RBI last week, which Jefferies believes could pave the way for additional orders from Indian banks.

items.title: Rate sensitive stocks mixed: bank, auto stocks rise after RBI slashes CRR by 50 bps; realty stocks sulk
items.description: The RBI maintained the repo rate at 6.5 percent, aligning with market expectations, and reaffirmed its "neutral" policy stance

items.title: Zen Tech hits record high as Nuvama expresses optimism over MoU with AVT Simulation
items.description: Zen Tech has delivered a staggering 147 percent gain year-to-date, far outpacing the Nifty 50's 14 percent rise during the same period.

items.title: Zaggle Prepaid Services surges 4% after three order wins in two days
items.description: In addition to these orders, Zaggle Prepaid is anticipated to secure new business following its recently signed seven-year contract with MasterCard Technology.

items.title: BSE stock soars to record high, zooms 19% in three days
items.description: The recent surge in BSE's share price over three consecutive sessions has been driven by a significant spike in trading volumes. Additionally, the stock recently debuted in the F&O segment starting with the December series.

items.title: Ceigall India shares rise 4% following Rs 54.21 crore arbitration award
items.description: The arbitral tribunal directed Greater Mohali Area Development Authority to pay Ceigall India Rs 54.21 crore along with 12 percent simple interest from the date of the award until payment is realised.

items.title: RBI MPC Policy: Experts are bullish on these top 10 rate-sensitive stocks after central bank cuts CRR
items.description: Moneycontrol collated a list of top 10 rate sensitive stocks from experts with a 3-4-week perspective after the Reserve Bank of India slashed cash reserve ratio by 50 bps.

items.title: Garden Reach Shipbuilders jumps 4% on signing second multi-purpose vessel in series of four
items.description: After subdued order inflows in the defense sector during H1FY25, analysts at Elara Securities anticipate a robust recovery

items.title: Nifty, Sensex remain flat as RBI keeps repo rate unchanged; PSU banks shine; IT, realty stocks decline
items.description: Among sectors, The PSU Bank index was the top gainer, rising 0.6 percent as RBI cut the CRR by 50 basis points.
